name: ecommerce-platform
description: Complete E-commerce Platform with React, Redux, Express, and MongoDB

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm --prefix frontend run start"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.audit: npm audit && npm audit --prefix backend && npm audit --prefix frontend
scripts.audit:fix: npm audit fix && npm audit fix --prefix backend && npm audit fix --prefix frontend
